title: WaveSpeed AI - Effortlessly Trim Your Videos

hero.heading: Trim Your Videos with Precision

prompt.heading: Trim Your Video
prompt.placeholder: E.g., Cut the first 10 seconds, remove the ending credits...

features.heading: Why Choose WaveSpeed AI?
features.description: Harness the power of AI to trim your videos faster and smarter, with professional output.

items.title: Speedy Processing
items.description: Get your edited clips in seconds using our advanced AI technology.

items.title: User-Friendly Interface
items.description: No editing experience required. Simply upload your video and trim away.

items.title: Secure Editing
items.description: Your videos are processed directly in your browser, ensuring complete privacy.

howItWorks.heading: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Three simple steps to perfect video clips

items.title: Upload Your Video
items.description: Drag and drop or select your video file. We support multiple formats including MP4, AVI, and MOV.

items.title: AI-Powered Trimming
items.description: Our AI intelligently identifies sections to keep and removes unwanted segments swiftly.

items.title: Download Your Clip
items.description: Preview the trimmed version and download your final video in high definition.

testimonial.heading: What Our Users Say

items.name: Emma Wilson
items.comment: I love how easy it is to remove the boring parts from my travel videos. This tool has saved me tons of time!

items.name: David Smith

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about the Video Trimmer

items.title: What types of videos can I trim?
items.description: You can trim various video formats including MP4, AVI, and MOV. Whether it's a personal vlog or a professional presentation, our tool handles it all.

items.title: Is WaveSpeed free to use?
items.description: Yes! Enjoy 30 minutes of video trimming daily at no charge. For frequent users, affordable subscription plans with extra features are available.

items.title: Can trimmed videos be used commercially?
items.description: Yes, users with a subscription plan can utilize the trimmed videos for commercial purposes. Free-tier users may use them for personal projects only.

items.title: How does the privacy protection work?
items.description: WaveSpeed processes videos directly in your browser with no uploads to our servers, ensuring your content remains private and secure.

footer.heading: Ready to Perfect Your Videos?
footer.description: Try WaveSpeed AI now and experience seamless video trimming. No sign-up needed.
